vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.2;
son of: Japheth (H3315);
brother of: Gomer (H1586), Magog (H4031), Madai (H4074), Javan (H3120), Meshech (H4902) and Tiras (H8494)
§ Tubal = "thou shall be brought"
n pr m
1) son of Japheth and grandson of Noah
n pr terr
2) a region in east Asia Minor
2a) perhaps nearly equal to Cappadocia
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
土巴 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "你應當被帶出來"
人名
1) 亞弗的兒子, 挪亞的孫子
地區名
2) 一個在東小亞細亞的地區
2a) 很可能就是加帕多家 (Cappadocia) 這個地方
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
土巴 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "你应当被带出来"
人名
1) 亚弗的儿子, 挪亚的孙子
地区名
2) 一个在东小亚细亚的地区
2a) 很可能就是加帕多家 (Cappadocia) 这个地方

vocabinfos.mediumDef:

n pr m
This name is used for:

n pr terr
2) a region in east Asia Minor
2a) perhaps nearly equal to Cappadocia

§ Tubal = "thou shall be brought"
n pr m
This name is used for:

2) a region in east Asia Minor
2a) perhaps nearly equal to Cappadocia
